headline: Piper Sandler Initiates Coverage of Roper Technologies (ROP) with ‘Overweight’ Rating, $600 PT
summary: Roper Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:ROP) is one of the most profitable large cap stocks to buy right now. On November 20, Piper Sandler analyst Clarke Jeffries initiated coverage of Roper Technologies with an Overweight rating on the shares and $600 price target. Jeffries noted that Roper Technologies has successfully transformed its business model and shifted from […]
